Este es su sexto crédito con MFP y no quiere dejar de pagar sus cuotas, así que ya esta ahorrando para cumplir con sus pagos. Dentro de su grupo comunal se le considera como una persona responsable y respetuosa con sus demás compañeros. Con los mil nuevos soles que solicita, comprará más abono para cuidar sus tierras.
texts.en:
Marcelino is 41 years old; he is a father and a very loving and responsible man. He lives in his own home with his wife, Dominica (36 years old) and their two youngest children who are the reason for all of his hard work. With much work, Marcelino has been able to give his family a good start in life by working laboriously on his banana and coffee crops by making sure that they are of very good quality since he depends on selling them quickly. What he enjoys most about his work is sowing the fields despite having to get rid of the plagues which hurt the crops most of the time. In the future he hopes to buy new lands to increase his crop production. This is Marcelino’s sixth loan with MFP (Kiva’s field partner) and he does not want to miss any of his quotas and is already saving money to meet his payments. In his communal group, he is considered to be a responsible and respectful person with the other members. With the 1,000 nuevos soles, he will buy more manure to take care of his fields.

Translated from Spanish by Mayra Duque, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy manure to take care of his fertile lands.

loans.name: Beatriz Elena

texts.en: Beatriz M. M., 33, lives in Barranquilla with her husband and 5 children who range in age from 2 to 18. She runs a business renting washing machines as well as selling various small items of merchandise. She started out with this business in 1999 during a time when her husband was without consistent employment and the family needed to increase its earnings. Beatriz bought two washing machines on credit and, building off the success of this venture, was gradually able to both pay off her loans and acquire more washing machines, three at a time until she reached her current total of 13. This loan represents her second from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, an organization she has been working with for the last four years and which she believes has improved her living conditions and her income. Beatriz dreams of eventually having a small shop which is why she started her side business selling merchandise in her home, which has given her additional and consistent income. She has requested this loan from Kiva  to buy three more washing machines, and other items such as cosmetics and women's clothes ordered by her clients, as well as to fix her bathroom floor. Shirley's biggest challenge is the competition which grows each day, but she always stays positive and does her best to help her clients and give them the best service possible.

loans.use: To buy three washing machines and cosmetics and clothing ordered by her clients as well as to fix her bathroom floor

loans.name: Faustina

texts.en:
Charcoal is obtained from burning a piece of fresh wood in the absence of oxygen. It is one of the most common sources of energy for cooking in every traditional home in Ghana. It is also the most affordable. Selling charcoal is a lucrative business for many women like Faustina. She purchases bags of charcoal in bulk and has been retailing charcoal to customers in her community for the past five years. She also trades in corn dough. She plans to invest the loan to purchase more bags of charcoal and maize to serve her customers. She anticipates increasing her profit level and also expanding her market.

Faustina is a commercial driver and she is the mother of three children from age 5-17 years. She describes herself as a jovial and resourceful mother who dreams of purchasing truckloads of maize to serve her customers and providing quality education to her children.

loans.use: To purchase charcoal and maize in bulk

loans.name: Victor Eduardo

texts.es:
Victo de 30 años, vive en el Fortín de Guayaquil (perímetro periurbano con restos de una ecología en disolución). Empezó en 1995 a trabaja como cerrajero en una empresa pero como lo liquidaron, tuvo que independizarse y conseguir dinero trabajando independientemente para solventa su hogar. 

Poco a poco con esfuerzo compro maquinaria como cerrajería, ahora el trabaja desde las 08h00pm hasta las 18h00pm todos los días con ayudantes. Para tener mas oportunidades de trabajar el quiere comprar con el préstamo aluminio, un compresor y soldaduras. 

En el futuro quiere terminar de construir los dormitorios de sus hijos, y tener otros talleres de cerrajería.
texts.en:
Victor, 30, lives in the El Fortín settlement of Guayaquil (an urban area on the outskirts of the city where there exists remnants of an ecology in dissolution.) He started in 1995, working for a company as a locksmith, but the company was liquidated. He had to become independent and earn money working on his own to cover the household expenses. Gradually, and with a lot of effort, he managed to buy the machinery needed to open his own locksmith business. Now he works from 8am until 6pm each day with his assistants. In order to have more work opportunities, he wants to buy aluminum, a compressor and welding equipment with this loan. In the future he wants to finish building rooms for his children and have another locksmith workshop.

Translated from Spanish by Lisa Grobar, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to buy aluminum, a compressor and welding equipment

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
On top of being a vibrant entrepreneur, Josephine is married to a pharmacist and together they have three kids from age 16-27 years old. Currently, all her kids are pursuing education at the tertiary level. It is Josephine’s dreams to support her children to successfully complete their tertiary education.

Josephine has been selling groceries like soap, canned foods, evaporated milk, crates of eggs, toiletries, washing powder, etc. for the past twenty years. Petty trading like the sale of groceries is widespread in Ghana because it is easy to start up. It usually begins with table-top selling and then grows to become a kiosk and may eventually become a supermarket. Josephine plans to invest the loan in the purchase of groceries in bulk to meet her demand.

loans.use: To purchase groceries in bulk.

loans.name: Shany

texts.en:
Shany E. T. runs a micro-enterprise called Exclusive Designs where she makes and sells handicrafts in the manner she learned as a young child, which is when she first dreamed of opening this kind of business. She started her training with ceramics, working with them for two years before moving on to new techniques with “country wood” and, ultimately, paint on canvas. She continued taking short classes to improve her art and currently works in the style of Britto, a Brazilian artist, making principally necklaces that go well with her other beautiful accessories. Given this orientation, her clients are mostly woman. 

Shany has been working with  Fundación Mario Santo Domingo for 8 years now, during which time she has received 10 loans that have gradually helped her to grow the business. Besides the loans, FMSD has also helped her learn small business techniques through entrepreneurial training sessions and access to various fairs and special events. She is very open-minded and always trying to learn new things to improve her business and herself as a person. Shany wants to use this Kiva loan to buy materials to use in the creation of her handicrafts that she can then sell in Bogota at the Feria Empresarial de la Mujer (“women's industry fair”).

Shany's dream is to begin exporting her products, as well as to get her own store and home for her family. Her biggest challenge is liquidity: clients often don't want to pay her up front for their special orders meaning she has to pay for the materials out of pocket. This is especially true when she goes to fairs and needs to make a lot in advance. This loan will help her overcome that, ensuring rapid production of the anticipated handicrafts.

loans.use: to buy materials used in the creation of her handicrafts

loans.name: Marina

texts.es: Marina, de 40 años, es una mujer que siempre a luchado por sobre salir en la vida, vive sola en su casa propia y lo que más desea es mejorar su calidad de vida. Los arduos trabajos que realiza Marina en su chacra, han hecho que sus plantaciones estén muy bien cuidadas y que los días de venta, sus productos sean rápidamente comprados. Su principal fuente de ingresos, es la venta de café, el cual vende en los mercados de la ciudad de “La Merced”. Disfruta mucho de la temporada de cosecha, ya que siente que su trabajo le esta devolviendo los esfuerzos que dio sobre sus cultivos. Lleva 15 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es cuidar sus cultivos de las plagas que pueden afectarlas. Con el tiempo, desea adquirir nuevas tierras, para ampliar sus cultivos. Este será su segundo crédito con MFP, y siempre ha sido muy puntual en sus pagos y nunca ha tenido problemas en su grupo comunal, en donde es la encargada de mantener unido a su grupo. Con los setecientos nuevos soles que solicita, comprará más abono para mejorar la productividad de sus tierras.
texts.en:
Marina is 40 years old and is a woman who has always worked hard to succeed in life. She lives alone in her own home and what she wishes for most is to improve her quality of life. The hard jobs that Marina does in her small farm have made her crops very good and when she sells them, they are sold quickly. Her main source of income is selling coffee and it is sold in the markets of the city “La Merced.” She enjoys harvest time since she feels that all her hard work is returned. She has worked for 15 years and says that the most difficult part of taking care of her crops are the plagues that affect them. In the future she hopes to get new land to increase her crop production. This is her second loan with MFP (Kiva’s field partner) and she has always been very punctual in her payments and has never had any problems with her communal group since she is in charge of keeping the group united. With the 700 nuevos soles, she will buy more manure to improve the productivity of her fields.

Translated from Spanish by Mayra Duque, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy manure to improve the productivity of her fields.

loans.name: Khadidiatou

texts.fr:
Madame Khadidiatou D. est une femme mariée de 33 ans qui habite dans la localité de  Ouakam.
Elle est sociétaire de la caisse depuis un an. Elle est mariée  et mère  de 5 enfants. Elle est enseignante de profession  dans le secteur de l’éducation, mais en même  temps elle pratique le commerce de tissus depuis 10 ans. C’est une activité  qu’elle a  choisi le biais de sa belle sœur. Et ce qui l’intéresse  le plus dans son activité c’est la satisfaction qu’elle procure à sa clientèle. Elle sollicite un crédit de 300 000frs destine a l’achat de tissus sollicites pour l’été. Ce crédit lui permettra d’accroitre ses gains financiers.
texts.en:
Mrs. Khadidiatou D. is a 33-year-old married woman who lives in Ouakam. She has been a member of the bank for five years. She is married and the mother of five children. She is a teacher in the educational system, but she has also been in the business of selling fabric for 10 years. She chose this type of work because of her sister-in-law. What interests her the most about her work is being able to satisfy her customers. She is requesting a loan of 300,000 XOF for the purchase of fabric that is in demand during the summer. This loan will allow her to increase her earnings.

Translated from French by Shannon Arnold, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to increase working capital

loans.name: Javier

texts.es:
Javier es un padre de familia de 41 años de edad que vive junto a su esposa y a sus dos hijos en el sector Corral de Palos, una zona rural del distrito agrícola de Cayaltí, el lugar ha experimentado un incremento en su actividad comercial durante los ultimos años. Se encuentra ubicado a una hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Javier trabaja desde hace cinco años en la crianza y venta de animales. Esta actividad le sirve para adquirir ingresos adicionales con los cuales solventa sus gastos familiares. El cría animales menores en corrales ubicados en la parte posterior de su domicilio y cuando estos ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo las ofrece en venta a los negociantes que visitan la zona frecuentemente.

Otra actividad que le provee de ingresos es el trabajar como vendedror en un grifo de la localidad, el trabaja vendiendo combustible a los transportistas de la zona durante todo el día.

Javier desea realizar algunas mejoras en su vivienda para mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia. Por ello ha solicitado por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.

Javier es un padre trabajador y bastante responsable. En la zona donde vive sus vecinos y conocidos le tienen mucha estima y le consideran una persona honrada.
texts.en:
Javier, age 41, is the head of a family. He lives with his wife and their two children in the Corral de Palos sector, a rural area in the agricultural district of Cayaltí. This place has experienced an increase in business activity during the past few years. It is located an hour from the city of Chiclayo.

For five years, Javier has worked raising and selling animals. This business has allowed him to acquire additional income with which to meet his family expenses. He raises small animals in pens located at the rear of his house. When they have matured, he offers them for sale to traders who frequently visit his area.

Another activity which provides him with income is his work as a sales person at a local gas station. He works all day selling fuel to transport workers.

Javier is a hardworking father and very responsible. In the area where he lives his neighbors and acquaintances have a lot of respect for him and consider him an honorable person.

Translated from Spanish by Richard Brown, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of construction mateirals in order to make improvements to his home.

loans.name: Elsa Maria

texts.es:
Doña Elsa es una mujer esforzada al trabajo, para ayudar a su familia, desde hace varios años logro poner su propio negocio una pulpería,  ya que solo con el salario de su esposo no daba para todos los gastos, ya que su salario es bajo ya que trabaja de conductor.

Con la ayuda de su esposo y los financiamientos de Afodenic logro el aumento de sus productos que día a día vende.
Su casa es sencilla de piedra y madera, que desea en un futuro hacer toda de concreto, ya que con este préstamo lograra invertir más en producto de granos como: arroz, frijoles, maíz, azúcar, jabón, papel, carnes, pollo, queso con el fin de aumentar las ventas y poder ofrecer todo al cliente, a parte que es lo esencial y lograr mejores ganancias que falta que le hace para pagar sus gastos.
texts.en:
Mrs. Elsa is a hardworking woman and to help her family, some years back she began her own business, a convenience store, since her husbands' wages are not enough to cover their expenses, he works as a driver.

With the help of her husband and the loans of Afodenic (Kiva’s field partner) she was able to increase the products that she sells day to day.

Elsa’s home is simple, made of stone and wood, and in the future she wishes to make her home in concrete. With this loan she will be able to buy more products like: rice, beans, corn, sugar, soap, paper, meats, chicken, and cheese with the goal to increase sales and provide everything needed to her customers and have better earnings which are needed to pay for her expenses.

Translated from Spanish by Mayra Duque, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy products to increase sales like:  rice, beans, corn, sugar, oil, basic goods to make daily foods for Nicaraguans.

loans.name: La Rosa De Saron Group

texts.es:
ESTE GRUPO SOLIDARIO SE LLAMA LA ROSA DE SARON ESTA UBICADO EN EL PUEBLO DE JALOXTOC EN EL ESTADO DE MORELOS,MEXICO, EL GRUPO ESTA CONFORMADO POR 5 INTEGRANTES QUE SE CONOCEN DESDE YA MUCHO TIEMPO PORQUE SON VECINOS, ESTE ES EL PRIMER PRESTAMO CON FUNDACION REALIDAD

EL REPRESENTANTE DEL GRUPO ES LA SRA. CARMEN M. S. TIENE 52 AÑOS DE EDAD, ESTUDIO LA PRIMARIA, TIENE DOS HIJOS VARONES YA CASADOS DE 31 AÑOS Y 32 AÑOS. SE DEDICA A LA VENTA DE TORTAS, TACOS DE ARROZ, JUGOS Y REFRESCOS, ESTA SOLICITANDO SU PRESTAMO PARA AMPLIAR SU NEGOCIO VA A COMPRA CHILES SECOS, REFRESCOS, SILLAS, MESAS Y TAMBIEN VA A ARREGLAR SU REFRIGERADOR. ESPERA TENER MAS GANANCIAS Y VOLVER A  INVERTIR EN EL NEGOCIO
SU CASA ESTA EN UNA ESQUINA ES DE 1 PISO.

EL SR. FACUNDO N. M. SE DEDICA A LOS ANTOJITOS
LA SRA. NANCY E. M. TIENE UNA TIENDA DE ABARROTES 
LA SRA MANUELA M. P.  TIENE UNA TIENDA DE ABARROTES
LA SRA NORMA J. B. SE DEDICA A LA VENTA POR CATALOGO
texts.en:
This Communal Bank is called La Rosa de Saron (The Rose of Saron). It is located in the town of Jalxtoc in the state of Morelos in Mexico. The group is comprised of five members. They have known each other for a long time because they are neighbors. This is their first loan with the Fundación Realidad. Carmen M. S. represents the group. She is 52 years old, and she has an elementary school education. She has two sons who are married. They are 31 and 32 years old. She sells sandwiches, rice tacos, juice, and soft drinks. She is requesting a loan to expand her business. She will buy dried chilies, soft drinks, tables, and chairs. She will also fix her refrigerator. She hopes to have more earnings and return to investing in her business. Her one story house is on a corner. Facundo N. M. sells snacks. Nancy E. M. has a grocery store. Manuela M. P. has a grocery store. Norma J. B. sells by catalog.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy tables, chairs, and merchandise like dried chilies and soft drinks

loans.name: Carmen Ysabel

texts.es:
Carmen tiene 28 años de edad, es soltera y vive en casa de sus padres ubicada en el distrito de Chepén, una zona bastante comercial que pertenece a la provincia del mismo nombre en la región de La Libertad, la zona se encuentra ubicada a una hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Se dedica desde hace mas de cinco años a la venta de productos de primera necesidad, abarrotes y productos en general en una bodega instalada en su domicilio. Ella se vale de este negocio para agenciarse de diversos ingresos que le permiten ayudar a sus padres a solventar los gastos personales por lo que siempre trata de mantener su negocio de la mejor manera posible: ofreciendo productos de calidad y un buen trato a sus clientes.

La demanda de los clientes por los productos que ofrece ha estado creciendo en los ultimos meses. Por ello Carmen desea ampliar su negocio con la compra de mas productos. Siguiendo su objetivo ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles.

Carmen es una mujer bastante responsable y entregada a su familia. Su mayor anhelo es darle a sus padres una mejor calidad de vida. Anteriormente ya ha trabajado con Nuestra Institución y ha demostrado puntualidad y responsabilidad al momento de asumir sus pagos.
texts.en:
Carmen is 28 years old, single, and lives in her parents' house which is located in the district of Chepén, a fairly commercial area that is part of the province of the same name in the La Libertad region. This area is an hour from the city of Chiclayo, capital of the Lambayeque region. For more than 5 years she has been selling basic necessities, groceries, and general goods from a store located in her home. She uses this business to bring in some extra income that helps her parents to cover their personal expenses and so she always tries to run her shop in the best way possible: offering high quality products and treating her customers well. The demand for products from her customers has been increasing in recent months. For this reason, Carmen wants to expand her business by buying more products. To reach her goal, she has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of $725. Carmen is a responsible woman and devoted to her family. Her greatest desire is to give her parents a better quality of life. She has worked with our institution before and has shown herself to be punctual and responsible in making her repayments.

Translated from Spanish by Alison Hynd, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy basic necessities and groceries to grow the store she runs from her home.

loans.name: Jorge Miguel

texts.en:
Jorge Miguel is a good man, living with his 18-year-old daughter and his wife, a teacher who runs a preschool out of the first floor of their home. Indeed, the high-pitched voices of the more than 30 tiny students swell up through the house during the day and seem to be music to the ears of this happy, smiling couple. 

Jorge sells natural medicines and takes pride in his work managing the health of his neighbors. He was born in Arenal, in the neighboring state of Bolivar, but has lived in Barranquilla since he was 14. He came here looking for a future and he found it, first going to the university until financial problems forced him to drop out of his Economics program and take a job at a local bank. He worked there for 5 years, and after losing his job began selling natural products. 

His tubercular father had done this before him, and Jorge took advantage of that to take on his father's former clients to kickstart his business. This also permitted him to branch out of his neighborhood along with several of his friends, and they all  began selling their goods throughout various municipalities in Barranquilla and then in the neighboring states of Cesar and Guajira, then on in to Venezuela. 

Thanks to this business (and the hard work his wife has done), Jorge has been able to take care of his home and family. This loan will be his first credit from Kiva and Fundación Mario Santo Domingo and he plans to use it to buy natural medicines such as antihistamines, vitamins, minerals, anti-aging products and even honey (to sweeten the taste of some of the more bitter medications), all to sell in his business. Jorge dreams of buying a place where he can independently showcase and sell his products. His greatest challenge so far has been the dearth of low-cost funding options available to small businesses, but through FMSD and Kiva he hopes to grow and continue helping those around him through his work.

[EN ESPANOL]       

Jorge Miguel Jiménez M. es un buen hombre que vive en carrizal con su hija de 18 años y su esposa, una pedagoga que tiene un reconocido centro educativo infantil en este barrio. Jorge Miguel  se dedica a la venta de medicamentos naturales, que asegura mejoran el estado de salud de las personas. Él nació en Arenal, departamento de Bolívar y desde sus 14 años esta radicado en Barranquilla, donde llegó buscando un mejor porvenir; terminó su bachillerato e ingresó a la universidad y por problemas económicos no pudo finalizar, así que hizo 8 semestres de Economía y se empleó en un banco, donde trabajó por 5 años y cuando perdió este empleo, se dedicó a vender productos naturales, negocio que a través de su padre, hombre mayorista de tubérculos en el mercado publico de Barranquilla, logró fortalecer aprovechando su clientela de entonces. Fue así como junto a varios amigos, comenzaron la distribución en diferentes municipios de Barranquilla, en los departamentos de la Guajira y el Cesar y también en Venezuela; con este negocio y el gran empuje de su esposa,  Jorge Miguel ha logrado sostener su hogar conformado  darle bienestar a su familia. En la actualidad solicita su primer crédito a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo para comprar medicinas naturales como antiinflamatorios, vitaminas, minerales, preventivos del envejecimiento y hasta miel pura de abejas, para venderlas en su negocio.
Sueña con comprar un local para  tener de manera independiente su tienda de productos naturistas y manifiestos como un gran  desafío,  las pocas oportunidades de créditos a bajo costo para   negocios pequeños, siente que a través de la medicina natural logra ayudar al que miles de personas se mantengan o recuperen su salud.

loans.use: to buy natural medicines such as antihistamines, vitamins, minerals, anti-aging products, and even honey

loans.name: Micaela

texts.es: Micaela es de 47 años de edad, es casada, tienen dos hijos una varón y una mujer, se dedica a confeccionar blusas y los vende en la plaza del mercado local, en la actividad tiene aproximadamente seis años de experiencia. Solicita su segundo préstamo para incrementar su capital de trabajo compra de materiales, el crédito anterior lo pago sin problema de atraso.
texts.en:
Micaela is 47 years old, married and has two children, a boy and a girl. She sews blouses and sells them in the local market square. She has six years' experience in this area. She is requesting this second loan to increase her working capital and purchase materials. She returned the previous loan with no repayment delay issues.

Translated from Spanish by Alba Sort , Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of merchandise

loans.name: Reyna Teresa

texts.es:
Doña Reyna es madre de tres hijos, de edad de 33 años, es una mujer dedicada al negocio en la venta de  carne de res,  desde hace varios años, con ayuda de su esposo comenzó a comprar carne en el carnit que esta a pocos kilómetros de su casa
Su esposo es mecánico y trabaja en un taller. Son de pocos recursos económicos, es por eso que para ella es importante su negocio ya que así ayuda  a sus hijos, su casa aun de zinc viejo, de tierra, las condiciones no han sido las mejores, siendo su objetivo hacer su casa de concreto es por eso con este préstamo lograra comprar piedra, arena, cemento, hierro y comenzar hacer el arranque para poder tener un techo mejor. 
Para ella no es fácil ya que tiene que tratar que los alimentos ajusten, las medicina cuando se enferman, los niños,  es  por eso se la había hecho difícil la mejora a su casa. lo que lograra con este financiamiento.
texts.en:
Mrs. Reyna is a mother to three children; she is 33 years old and a dedicated woman to her business where she sells meat and for some years with the help of her husband she began to buy meat in a beef market that is a few kilometers from her home.

Her husband is a mechanic and works in a repair shop. They have limited income and it is important for her to keep her business since she gets to help her children. Reyna’s home is still made of old zinc, and dirt, living conditions are not the best and her objective is to make her house out of concrete and with this loan she will buy stones, sand, cement, and steel to start building and to have a better roof.

For her it is not easy since she has to prepare the food and medicine when the children get sick and because of that she has had trouble improving her home and she will be able to do this now thanks to the loan.

Translated from Spanish by Mayra Duque, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy construction materials to start building a better roof.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: Juana es de 56 años de edad, es casada, tiene dos hijos un varón y una mujer, se dedica a la actividad de agricultura, siembra de verduras, en la actividad tiene aproximadamente 10 años de experiencia, en ASDIR solicita su segundo préstamo para incrementar su capital de trabajo  compra de semillas y fertilizantes, el crédito anterior lo pago sin problemas de atrasos.
texts.en:
Juana is 56 years old and married. She has two children, a boy and a girl. Her business activity is agriculture and she plants vegetables. She has 10 years' experience. She is requesting this ASDIR loan, her second, to increase her working capital and buy seeds and fertilisers. She had no issues or delays repaying the previous loan.

Translated from Spanish by Alba Sort , Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of raw materials

loans.name: Daavi

texts.en: Daavi D. sells cocoa drink with doughnuts at Abura.  She has junior high level of education.  She is married and her husband works in a car washing bay. Her loan will be used to buy extra packs of cocoa drink for sale. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to buy more ingredients to bake some cookies and other floury foods to sell and to add other drinks.

loans.use: buy extra packs of cocoa drink for sale

loans.name: Lidia Candelaria

texts.es: Lidia es de 29 años de edad, es casada, tiene un hijo y una hija, se dedica a la actividad de comercio venta de ropa en general, en la actividad tiene aproximadamente 8 años de experiencia, en ASDIR solicita su segundo préstamo para incrementar su capital y poder surtir mejor su venta, el crédito anterior lo pago sin problema de atraso.
texts.en:
Lidia is 29 years old. She is married with one son and one daughter. She has been selling clothes of all sorts for around 8 years. She is requesting her second loan from ASDIR, to increase her working capital and enable her to carry a larger stock. She paid off the previous loan without falling behind on payments.

Translated from Spanish by Rosa Oswald, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy merchandise

loans.name: Juan Ventura

texts.es: Juan es de 55 años de edad, es casado, tiene dos hijos varones y una mujer, se dedica a la actividad de comercio compra venta de traje típico cortes y güipiles, en la actividad tiene aproximadamente 10 años de experiencia, en ASDIR solicita su segundo préstamo para incrementar su capital de trabajo, el crédito anterior lo pago sin problema de atraso,
texts.en:
Juan is 55 years old, married, and has two sons and a daughter. He earns his living by buying and selling traditional clothing, güipiles (woven ponchos) etc. He has 10 years of experience in this business. Juan is seeking a second loan with Kiva partner ASDIR, and the money will be used to increase his working capital. There were no problems with repayment of his previous loan.

Translated from Spanish by Jane Agg, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es:
Margarita es una madre de familia que tiene 53 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo y a sus hijos en el cercado de la ciudad de Chiclayo, una ciudad conocida a nivel nacional como la 'Ciudad de la Amistad', es uno de los principales ejes comerciales del norte del país debido a su movimiento comercial y de transporte.

Se dedica desde hace mas de diez años a la venta de platos de comida en un local instalado en su domicilio, el cual está cerca del principal mercado de la ciudad lo cual hace que tenga una demanda permanente durante la mayoría de días del año. Su especialidad son las comidas típicas de la región y gracias a su buena sazón ya es conocida en el rubro y tiene un grupo de clientes fieles.

Margarita desea realizar una mejoras en el mobiliario de su establecimiento comprando mas mobiliario como sillas y mesas para poder ampliar su capacidad de atención y lograr que sus clientes se sientan más cómodos. Para lograr su objetivo se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles.

Margarita es una mujer empeñosa y bastante trabajadora. Su mayor anhelo es seguir ampliando su negocio hasta tener un restaurante mas grande. En la zona ella es considerada por sus vecinos y conocidos como una mujer amable y de confianza.
texts.en:
Margarita is a 53-year old mother, who lives with her husband and children in the city of Chiclayo. Chiclayo is known nationally as the City of Friendship, and it is one of the main commercial areas in the north of the country because of the transportation routes and trade. For more than 10 years she was worked selling food out of a restaurant attached to her home, which is located near the main market of the city. This good location means that she has constant demand almost every day year-round. Her specialty is typical regional food and thanks to her food's rich flavor her restaurant is well known and she has a group of loyal customers. Margarita wants to improve the furniture in her restaurant by buying new chairs and tables to expand the capacity and make her customers more comfortable. To make these purchases she decided to apply for her first loan from Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 2000 new soles. Margarita is an earnest and hard-working woman. Her wish is to keep growing her business and one day have a bigger restaurant. In her neighborhood she is considered to be kind and trustworthy.

Translated from Spanish by Patrick King, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purcahse of chairs and tables for restaurant

loans.name: Nery Paulino

texts.es: Nery es de 25 años de edad, es soltero, se dedica a prestar sus servicios para una ONG, en ASDIR solicita su segundo préstamo para comprar una computadora que le servirá para su trabajo y sus estudios, el crédito anterior lo pago sin problema de atraso, sus referencias personales indican que es una persona responsable.
texts.en:
Nery is a single 25-year old who works for a NGO. This will be his second loan with ASDIR, and he will use the loan to purchase a computer to use for work and for his studies. He repaid his previous loan with no late payments, and his personal references show that he is a responsible person.

Translated from Spanish by Patrick King, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of computer

loans.name: Julio Crispin

texts.es: Julio es de 33 años de edad, tiene tres hijas, se dedica a la actividad de carpintería hace mas de 10 años, lo cual le ha  ayudado al sustento de su familia. En ASDIR solicita su primer préstamo para incrementar su capital de trabajo en materia prima, sus referencias apersónales indican que es una persona responsable con mucho ánimo de superar.
texts.en:
Julio is 33 years old and has three daughters. He has worked as a carpenter for more than 10 years, which has helped him provide for his family. He is applying for his first loan with ASDIR to increase his business capital with raw materials. His personal references indicate that he is a responsible person with a real desire to overcome his problems.

Translated from Spanish by Patrick King, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of materials for furniture making

loans.name: Lucy Margarita

texts.en:
Having mastered the wonderful art of tailoring, Lucy runs a micro-enterprise in which she makes all types of clothes for women, men and children. For her, the skill was a family tradition she perfected over years of practice and study, along the way making a bit of a name for herself in the neighborhood, thanks to the high quality of her work. 

Lucy came to Fundación Mario Santo Domingo one year ago and has now applied for her second loan, this time with Kiva, that she plans to use to buy primary materials such as fabrics, thread, and buttons to turn into dresses based on her clients' measurements. Since she started with FMSD, Lucy has bought her materials in an efficient manner, without needing to maintain a special inventory that could potentially deteriorate over time in the humid climate. 

Lucy's biggest challenge is that her workspace is cramped and is located within her family's home (a condition which currently leads to longer work days than she'd prefer). She dreams of setting up a workshop completely separate from her home so as to put a bit of space between her professional and personal lives. She also envisions her children (aged 15 and 21) becoming professionals and for that reason she and her husband work hard to encourage and finance their studies. 

[EN ESPANOL]
Lucy S. Domínguez domina el maravilloso arte de la confección, por eso creó su microempresa donde fabrica todo tipo de ropa en  las líneas  femenina, masculina e infantil; ella aprendió a preparar, cortar y ensamblar piezas por tradición familiar y poco a poco, mediante el estudio ha ido perfeccionando sus técnicas, por eso hoy tiene muchas personas, que reconocen  su trabajo de calidad y se han sostenido como sus clientes. Desde hace un año pertenece a los programas de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo y este es su segundo crédito por valor de $2.000.000 COP, con el cual va comprar materias primas, como telas e hilos y botones que le faciliten elaborar vestidos sobre medidas que le han solicitado sus clientes. Desde que ella accedió a créditos con esta organización compra de manera eficiente, sin necesidad de mantener un Stock de inventarios que puedan deteriorarse, porque ahora se ha organizado en este sentido.
Su sueño más importante es establecer un taller totalmente separado de su medio familiar, para no mezclar sus responsabilidades productivas y domesticas y  muchas veces extender sus  jornadas de trabajo. Igualmente visiona a sus hijos de 21 y 15 años como unos profesionales de calidad y por eso ella con su cónyuge trabajan persistentemente para conseguir esta meta. Su mayor desafío es lograr algún día tener un amplio local donde establecer su taller, porque el que actualmente tiene es muy estrecho.

loans.use: to buy primary materials such as fabrics, thread, and buttons

loans.name: Adama

texts.fr: Adama C. est une femme de 28 ans, elle est veuve et mère de 05 enfants en charge. Elle est membre du Banc Villageois de BOYINGUEL depuis 2007 et a reçu 09 fois de suite de crédit. Elle développe un petit commerce de sucre, huile végétale, de riz et d'autres condiments. Son nouveau prêt lui permettra d'acheter la marchandise prêt-citée. Étant veuve, son objectif est de prendre en charge les besoins de sa progéniture par exemple: la nourriture, la santé et la couverture vestimentaire de sa progéniture. Elle voudrais tout en assurant les charges familiales renforcer son niveau d'épargne afin de prétendre à un prêt plus important.
texts.en:
Adama C. is a 28-year-old woman who is a widow and the mother of five children in her care. She has been a member of the Banc Villageois of BOYINGUEL since 2007 and has had nine consecutive loans. She is developing a small business involving sugar, vegetable oil, rice, and other condiments. Her new loan will enable her to buy the aforementioned merchandise. Being a widow, Adama's goal is to meet the needs of her children in term of, for example, food, health care, and clothing. She would like boost her savings while she ensures family expenses are covered. She could then seek a larger loan.

Translated from French by Dan Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Bolstering her investment capital for better supplies of merchandise

loans.name: Pedro Martin

texts.es:
Pedro de 37 años, vive en el Fortín de Guayaquil (perímetro periurbano con restos de una ecología en disolución). El tiene un taller de costura, pero antes de confeccionar ropa tuvo que ser sastre de ropa. 

Con esfuerzo y dedicación el pudo comprar una maquina de coser y tener su taller de confección en su casa. El hace camisetas, pantalones, conjuntos de ropa. Trabaja desde las 07h00am hasta las 18h00pm. Para tener mas oportunidad de incrementar su negocio el quiere comprar con el préstamo telas, hilos y una maquina de coser.  

En el futuro quiere tener su propio local para el taller y terminar de construir su casa que aun es de caña.
texts.en:
Pedro is 37 years old and lives in the el Fortín area in Guayaquil, an area on the outskirts of the city with a crumbling environment. He has a sewing shop, but before making his own clothes he worked as a tailor making alterations and repairs. With hard work and dedication he was able to buy a sewing machine, and he runs his sewing shop out of his house. He makes shirts, pants, and other outfits. He works from 7:00 am to 6:00 pm. To have a better chance of growing his business he will use the loan to purchase fabrics, thread, and another sewing machine. In the future he would like to have a separate location for his shop and finish building his home, which is still made of sugar cane.

Translated from Spanish by Patrick King, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Fabric, thread, and a sewing machine

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es:
El Sr  Miguel   es soltero, vive con sus padres,  tiene un pequeño negocio donde vende accesorios para teléfonos y recarga de saldos,  en el barrio las mercedes ,  la venta en la  misma es gratificante ya que cuenta con una considerable cantidad de clientes y el ingreso es bastante satisfactoria.

Con la ayuda de su esposa  están  saliendo adelante con voluntad, trabajo y dedicación.
Hoy día se ha convertido en un microempresario exitoso y en constante progreso.
Actualmente el desea vender además de accesorios, celulares de distintos modelos con el podrá mejorar mucho  sus ingreso, para concretar la compra el solicita el préstamo.
texts.en:
Miguel is single and lives with his parents. He has a small business selling cell phone accessories and credit for pre-paid cell phones in the Mercedes neighborhood. Selling his products is gratifying, and he has a considerable number of clients making him a satisfactory income. With his wife's help, they are succeeding with a strong will, work, and dedication. Their business has become a successful microenterprise, and they are always showing progress. Currently, he is hoping to sell several different models of cell phones along with the accessories. This would greatly increase his income. He is applying for the loan to purchase a supply of cell phones.

Translated from Spanish by Patrick King, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of cell phones, cell phone accessories, and pre-paid phone cards

loans.name: Haby

texts.fr: Haby B. ets une femme de 41 ans, elle est mariée et mère de 06 enfants en charge. Elle est membre du Banc Villageois de BOYINGUEL depuis 4 ans et demi et a bénéficié 9 fois de suite de crédit. Elle fait de l'embouche bovine et son nouveau prêt lui permettra d'acheter une paire de bœufs, de les engraisser pendant au moins 5 mois et les revendre au niveau des marchés hebdomadaires de sa zone. Son objectif principal est de participer à la prise en charge de sa famille et de renforcer son niveau d'épargne.
texts.en:
Haby B. is a 41-year-old married mother of 6 young children. She has been a member of the Banc Villageois of Bouyinguel for four and a half years and has had 9 loans. She fattens cattle, and her new loan will allow her to buy a pair of beef cattle, fatten them for at least five months, and resell them in the weekly markets in her area. Her main goal is to participate in the care of her family and to strengthen their level of savings.

Translated from French by Rachel Braff, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy a pair of beef cattle and fatten them for resale

loans.name: Marily

texts.en:
Maryli is a 37-year-old woman living near Barranquilla who owns and runs a restaurant. She lives with her husband and two children, ages 8 and 15. She's a talented woman, intrepid and very hard-working. 

Besides her restaurant, she also runs a mobile fast-food stall and sells and repairs cell-phones. For 15 years she has collaborated with  Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, gradually growing her business through microloans and, consequently, increasing her income and quality of life. 

Maryli dreams of buying her own house where she could develop her businesses to make them as productive as possible. With this current loan, she intends to buy a freezer and invest in ingredients like rice, meats, and grains, all to be purchased in bulk to improve her margins. 

Marylis is a family woman, and she and her husband work side by side every day to keep them all moving forward.

[EN ESPANOL}
Maryli Rodríguez V., tiene 37 años y vive en un Municipio de Soledad  en el Departamento del Atlántico,  es propietaria del restaurante MaryVane y vive con su cónyuge y sus dos hijos en las edades de 8 y 15 años de edad. Maryli  es una mujer con muchas habilidades,  intrépida y muy trabajadora, al mismo tiempo que  tiene un negocio de restaurante,   maneja la línea  comidas rápidas y así mismo  vende accesorios de celulares y  simultáneamente presta el servicio de mantenimiento de los mismos.  Ella es otra de las clientes mas antiguas  porque tiene 15 años de participar con los programas de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo y ha crecido de la mano de esta organización, pues gradualmente con sus créditos y sus componentes no financieros ha podido incrementar sus ingresos y aumentar su nivel de vida. Su sueño principal es tener una casa propia donde poder desarrollar su negocio y potenciarlo a su máxima expresión productiva. En la actualidad solicita su crédito a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo  para comprar un congelador e  invertir en materias primas como arroz, carnes y granos, lo cual le dejará mayor utilidad por su compra en mayor volumen. Marylis goza de una familia a quien ama y día a día con su cónyuge trabajan para sacarla adelante.

loans.use: buy a freezer and invest in ingredients like rice, meats, and grains

loans.name: Lilian Janira

texts.es: Lilian es de 38 años de edad, es casada, tiene tres hijos un varón y dos mujeres, se dedica a prestar sus servicios como maestra de educación hace aproximadamente 10 años, solicita su sexto crédito para compra una computadora que le servirá para su trabajo y uso personal de su familia, sus créditos anteriores los pago sin problema de atraso.
texts.en:
Lilian is 38 years old, married, and has three children (a son and two daughters). She has worked as a teacher for approximately ten years.

Lilian is requesting her sixth loan to buy a computer for her job and for personal use by her family. Her previous loans were repaid without problems or delays.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase a computer for work and for personal use

loans.name: Marleny

texts.es: Marleny, de 23 años, es una madre de familia muy alegre y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Richard de 23 años y su hija menor Yudely de 2 años, quienes son el motivo de todos sus esfuerzos. Trabajando con mucho ahínco, Marleny ha logrado sacar adelante las plantaciones de plátano y café que posee. En el poblado donde habita, es reconocida por la calidad de sus cultivos y esto es gracias al esfuerzo que le ha dado a sus siembras, por tal motivo la venta de este producto es de manera rápida. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cosechar sus cultivos, ya que siente que el trabajo que realizo meses atrás dio sus frutos, lleva 5 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es limpiar las plantaciones de café para poder sembrar nuevamente. Más adelante, espera incrementar la cantidad que produce actualmente, es por ello que desea comprar nuevas tierras. Este es su segundo crédito con MFP, sabe que este préstamo le ayudara bastante en el progreso y desarrollo de su negocio, es por eso que esta dispuesta a pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente, en su grupo comunal es una socia muy responsable, motivo por el cual es muy querida. Con los mil quinientos nuevos soles que solicita, comprará más abono y fertilizantes para sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Marleny is 23 years old and a happy hardworking mother. She lives in her own home with her husband Richard (age 23) and their two year old daughter Yudely, who are the reason behind all her efforts. She has managed to succeed in growing bananas and coffee on her farm. In the village where she lives, Marleny is known for the quality of her crops. Thanks to her efforts, she is able to sell her products quickly. What she enjoys most about her work is harvesting her crops because she reaps the rewards after months of labor. Marleny has been farming for five years and considers the most difficult part to be clearing her coffee fields in order to plant a new crop. Later on she hopes to increase the quantity she produces, so she wants to buy more land.

This is her second loan with MFP. Marleny knows that this loan will be a great help in advancing and developing her business, so she is willing to complete all of her payments on time. In her Communal Bank, she is a very responsible member who is held in high regard. With the loan of 1500 PEN that she requested, Marleny plans to buy more compost and fertilizers for her crops.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase compost & fertilizers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase merchandise

loans.name: Aminata Djiby

texts.fr: Aminata Djiby D. est une femme de 22 ans, elle est mariée et mère de 02 enfants en charge. Elle est membre du Banc Villageois de BOUYINGUEL depuis 01 ans et demi et a bénéficié 03 fois de suite de crédit. Elle fait de l'embouche bovine et son nouveau prêt lui permettra d'acheter deux bœufs, de les engraisser pendant au moins 5 mois, son mari va l'aider pour la commercialisation des bêtes. Son objectif est de participer à l'amélioration des conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Aminata Djiby D. is 22 years old, married and the mother of two children in her care. She has been a member of the Bouyinguel Banc Villageois for the past year and a half and has had three consecutive loans. She fattens cattle and her new loan will allow her to buy two cattle and fatten them up for at least five months. Her husband will help her in the sale of her cattle. Mrs. D.'s goal is to particpate in the improvement of her family's living conditions.

Translated from French by Sarah Puchner, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy a pair of cattle to fatten

loans.name: Yolanda Cane

texts.es: Yolanda es de 38 años de edad, es casada, tiene tres hijo dos varones y una mujer, se dedica a prestar sus servicios como maestra de educación, tiene aproximadamente 10 años de esta trabajando en la escuela de la localidad, solicita su primer préstamo para sufragar los gastos médicos de una cirugía que le practican en los próximos días. Sus referencias personales indican que es una persona responsable.
texts.en:
Yolanda is 38 years old, married, and has three children (two sons and a daughter). She has been a teacher for approximately ten years and works at the local school.

Yolanda is requesting her first loan to cover medical expenses since she will be undergoing surgery within the next few days. Her personal references indicate she is a responsible person.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Pay for surgery

loans.name: Mirtha Hungria

texts.es:
Mirtha de 36 años, vive en la Primavera de Duran (perímetro urbano fue originalmente irregular, con varios cerros, riachuelos y lagunas que aún se presentan como restos de una ecología en disolución). Ella tiene una tienda de víveres ( las rejas que aparecen en la foto es para la seguridad de la tienda ya que esta dentro de su casa). 

Para poder solventar los gastos familiares ella tuvo que invertir sus ahorros porque su esposo había fallecido y no tenia ingresos para sus hijos. Poco a poco con esfuerzo a podido surtir mas su negocio, Trabaja desde las 08h00am hasta las 19h00pm todos los días. 

Con el préstamo quiere comprar arroz, azúcar y aceite para su loca. En el futuro quiere surtir mas su negocio con nuevos productos.
texts.en:
Mirtha is 36 years old and lives in Primavera de Duran (an urban area that originally consisted of irregular terrain with several hills, streams, and lakes that still exist as remnants of a disappearing ecosystem). She manages a grocery store (the bars that appear in the photo help protect her store since it is inside her home).

In order to cover her family’s expenses, she had to invest her savings because her husband died and she had no income for her two children. With effort, Mirtha was gradually able to increase the inventory of her business. She works from 8am until 7pm every day.

She will use this loan to buy rice, sugar, and oil for her store. In the future, she wants to restock her store with new products.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase rice, sugar, and oil

loans.name: Humberto Pascual

texts.es: Humberto es de 58 años de edad, es casado, tiene tres hijos dos varones y una mujer, se dedica a la actividad de comercio venta de ropa en general tiene aproximadamente ocho años de experiencia, solicita su primer préstamo para incrementar su capital y surtir mejor su negocio, sus referencias personales indican que es una persona responsable y trabajador.
texts.en:
Humberto is 58 years old, married, and has three children (two sons and a daughter). He works as a clothing merchant and has approximately eight years of experience.

Humberto is requesting his first loan to increase his capital and improve his business inventory. Her personal references indicate he is a responsible and hardworking individual.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase merchandise

loans.name: Aïssatou Elhadj

texts.fr: Aïssatou ELHADJ D. est âgée de 37 ans, elle est mariée et mère d'un enfant en charge. Elle est membre du Banc Villageois de BOYINGUEL depuis le 16 octobre 2008. Elle développe un petit commerce de sucre, de thé, de lait et d'autres condiments de cuisine. Avec son nouveau prêt elle va acheter en quantité plus importantes ces produit énumérés en vue de réaliser plus de bénéfices. C'est depuis son adhésion dans le Banc Villageois qu'elle a initié cette activité qu'elle voit se développer de cycle en cycle. Elle participe financièrement à la prise en charge de la famille.
texts.en:
Aïssatou ELHADJ D. is 37 years old and a married mother of one child in her care. She has been a member of the Banc Villageois of BOYINGUEL since October 16, 2008. She is developing a small business involving sugar, tea, milk, and other kitchen condiments. With her new loan, she is going to buy larger amounts of these itemized products with the goal of making more profit. Aïssatou initiated this business since joining the Banc Villageois. She sees developing it from loan cycle to loan cycle. She takes part financially in providing for the family.

Translated from French by Dan Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Bolstering her small-scale business for tea, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es:
La  Sra. Nancy está casada con el Sr. Agustín  y tienen 1 hija  menor está cursando la escuela primaria.
Nancy tiene una farmacia en su casa desde hace varios años. 
Ella es muy conocida en su barrio por sus conocimientos hacia los medicamentos. 
Ella se inicio en otro trabajo donde trabajo como farmacéutica y con el correr de los años decidió abrir su propio negocio. 
 Su marido es camionero y con esos ingresos le ayuda con los gastos del hogar. 
Hemos confiado en Nancy en otros créditos anteriores  y ha cumplido con total cabalidad con sus compromisos. 
Ella es una persona muy responsable y con ganas de superación, tiene un espíritu jovial y emprendedor.
Solicita el crédito para la compra de medicamentos.
texts.en:
Sra. Nancy is married to Sr. Agustín. They have a young daughter who is attending elementary school. Nancy has a pharmacy in her house that she has managed for several years. She is well-known in her neighborhood for her knowledge about medicines.

Nancy started at another job where she worked as a pharmacist, but after a few years passed she decided to open her own business. Her husband is a truck driver and his earnings help with the household expenses. Nancy has utilized previous loans and completely fulfilled all of her commitments. She is a very responsible person who desires to succeed. Nancy is known for her jovial and enterprising spirit. She is requesting a loan to buy medicines.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase medicines

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase fertilizers

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en:
Juliet is a 36-year-old mother of four children. As a single mother, she is responsible for the welfare of her children because she is the breadwinner for her family. Juliet sells used clothing in the market in Fort Portal, Uganda. Besides clothing sales, Juliet also has a beauty salon which enables her to supplement her income so as to make ends meet. 

Juliet says in her clothing business, she faces a challenge of transportation of her purchases which sometimes delays her expected time of selling to clients. She hopes to have every clothing material in future so as to be able to serve a wide variety of customers' needs. This is her fourth loan from HOFOKAM and she intends to purchase second-hand clothing for resale and a dryer and chairs for her beauty salon.

loans.use: purchasing second-hand clothing for resale and a dryer and chairs for her salon

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en:
Juliet is a 36-year-old mother of four children. As a single mother, she is responsible for the welfare of her children because she is the breadwinner for her family. Juliet sells used clothing in the market in Fort Portal, Uganda. Besides clothing sales, Juliet also has a beauty salon which enables her to supplement income so as to make ends meet. 

Juliet says in her clothing business, she faces a challenge of transportation of her purchases which sometimes delays her expected time of selling to customers. She hopes to have every clothing material in future so as to be able to serve a wide variety of customers' needs. This is a loan Juliet has decided to take out to enable her to pay school fees for her children. She says it's difficult to pay the fees on time thus the need for credit.

loans.use: Paying school fees for the children

loans.name: Eleno

texts.es:
El Señor Eleno V. tiene 63 años de edad, esta casado hace 36 años, su esposa trabaja en una fábrica hace más de 15 años, tienen 3 hijos ya todos mayores e independientes.
El Sr. V. tiene una panaderia hace 12 años aproximadamente, se inicio como ayudante panadero en una fábrica cercana a su domicilio, luego esta panaderia cerró sus puertas y el inicio una pequeña panaderia cacera, luego con un crédito accedió a la compra de sus primeras maquinarias y asi aumento su producción, vende a todas las despensas, copetines y bares de la zona.
Su sueño es contar con un horno eléctrico porque  con esa máquina se ahorraria tiempo y trabajo. 
Solicita el crédito para compra de harinas en cantidades mayoristas.
texts.en:
Sr. Eleno V. is 63 years old and has been married for 36 years. His wife has worked at a factory for more than 15 years. They have three adult children who are all independent.

Sr. V. has managed a bakery for approximately 12 years. He started out as a baker’s assistant at a factory near his home. That business later closed its doors, so she established a small bakery in his house. He later agreed to take a loan so that he could buy his first few machines so that he could increase his production. Eleno sells his products to all the stores, snack shops, and bars in the area.

He hopes to acquire an electric oven because this type of machine would save him time and effort. Eleno is requesting a loan to buy flour in large quantities.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase flour in large quantities

loans.name: Renee

texts.es: Renee, de 45 años, es una mujer muy trabajadora y alegre, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Nicolás de 45 años y sus 3 menores hijos, a quienes desea brindarles una mejor calidad de vida. Los largos días de trabajo que tiene Renee en sus tierras, la han convertido en una experta y gran conocedora de la agricultura. El tener sus cultivos bien cuidados y saludables, le han dado ventaja en la comercialización, por lo que siempre consigue un buen precio por la venta de café y plátanos que produce. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cultivar la tierra, ya que es la actividad que realiza desde que era niña, lleva 30 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus productos hasta la ciudad de “La Merced”. Con el tiempo, espera comprar más tierras y así incrementar su producción. Este es el sexto préstamo de Renee con MFP y esta ahorrando para pagar sus cuotas a tiempo, ya que no quiere causarle problemas a las socias de su banco comunal, donde se siente muy contenta. Con los dos mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más abono para que sus cultivos sean más productivos.
texts.en:
Renee is a 45 year old woman who is hardworking and cheerful. She lives in her own home with her husband Nicolás, age 45, and their three young children for whom she wants to provide a better quality of life. The long days of working on her land have made Renee an expert in agriculture. She takes good care of her crops so that they grow in healthy conditions, which gives her an advantage when it comes time to sell them. Renee always gets a good price for the coffee and bananas that she produces. What she enjoys most about her work is cultivating the land since it is something she has done since she was a little girl. She has been doing this for 30 years and considers the most difficult part to be transporting her products to the city of La Merced. In time she hopes to buy more land so that she can increase her production.

This is her sixth loan with MFP. Renee sets aside enough money so that she can make her payments on time because she does not want to create problems for the members of her Communal Bank. She feels happy to be part of this group. The loan of 2000 PEN that she requested will be used to buy more compost for her crops so that she can be more productive.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase compost

loans.name: Celina

texts.es:
Celina es conviviente y tiene un hijo pequeño, vive en casa alquilada y su mayor sueño es tener casa propia. Celina junto a su esposo se dedican a la fabricación de trapeadores de Yute, el material lo adquieren en la ciudad de Lima, su capacidad de producción es de 3 docenas de trapeadores por día, sus ventas los realiza repartiendo a las tiendas y de acuerdo a sus pedidos. Además tienen una mototaxi con el cual su esposo realiza transporte de pasajeros. Su préstamo será invertido en la compra de telas e hilos.
Celina es socia del Banco Comunal Buena Suerte y lo que mas le gusta es el incentivo al ahorro.
Los sueños de Celina son comprar un carro para que su esposo trabaje y construir su casa.
texts.en:
Celina is in a common law marriage and has a young son. She lives in a rented house, but her greatest dream is to have one of her own. Celia and her husband manufacture mops made of jute. They acquire their materials from the city of Lima. Their production capacity is three dozen mops per day.

Celina sells and delivers her products to stores based on orders. They also own a motorcycle taxi that her husband drives in order to provide passenger transportation services. Her loan will be used to buy fabrics and thread.

Celina is a member of the Communal Bank “Buena Suerte” (Good Luck). What she likes most is having the incentive to save. Her dreams include buying a car for her husband to use for work and building a house.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase fabrics & thread

loans.name: Fabian

texts.es:
Fabián es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos que están estudiando, Fabián es socio del Banco Comunal Buena Suerte.
Fabián tiene un taller de Carpintería en su casa, actividad que realiza independientemente hace 3 años, Fabián inicio trabajando en otro taller de carpintería como ayudante y gracias a sus ahorros y prestamos logro implementar su taller, actividad que realiza con la ayuda de su esposa que le ayuda en el lijado y pintado de los muebles, la producción es de acuerdo a los pedidos de sus clientes.
Fabian necesita un préstamo de 1000 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de triplay.
Fabian sueña con tener maquinas modernas para implementar su taller y comprar una computadora para su hijo.
texts.en:
Fabián is in a common law marriage and has two children in school. He is a member of the Communal Bank “Buena Suerte” (Good Luck).

Fabián has a carpentry workshop in his home and has worked independently for three years. He started working at another carpentry business as an assistant and used his savings and loans to open his shop. His wife helps with the business by sanding and painting furniture. Production is based on the orders he receives from his customers.

Fabián needs a loan of 1000 PEN to invest in the purchase of plywood. He hopes to acquire modern equipment to use in his shop and buy a computer for his son.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase plywood

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es:
Ana de 32 años, vive en la Primavera de Duran (perímetro urbano fue originalmente irregular, con varios cerros, riachuelos y lagunas que aún se presentan como restos de una ecología en disolución). Ella tiene una tienda en su casa de caña (las rejas que aparecen en la foto es para la seguridad de la tienda ya que esta dentro de su casa).

Para poder solventar los gastos familiares ella tuvo que invertir sus ahorros, decidió invertir sus ahorros y venderlos en su  casa. Compro arroz, bebidas y víveres. Poco a poco con esfuerzo a podido agrandar mas su negocio.

Con el préstamo quiere comprar arroz, azúcar y aceite para su tienda. En el futuro quiere surtir mas su negocio con nuevos productos.  Y construir su casa de cemento.
texts.en:
Ana is 32 years old and lives in Primavera de Duran (an urban area that originally consisted of irregular terrain with several hills, streams, and lakes that still exist as remnants of a disappearing ecosystem). She manages a store in her house made of reeds (the bars that appear in the photo help protect her store since it is inside her home).

In order to cover her family’s expenses, she decided to invest her savings and begin selling from her house. Ana bought rice, beverages, and supplies. With effort over time, she was able to expand her business.

Ana will use this loan to buy rice, sugar, and oil for her store. In the future, she wants to restock her business with new products and build a cement house.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase rice, sugar, and oil

loans.name: Alicia

texts.es:
Alicia pertenece al Banco Comunal Buena Suerte y lo que mas le agrada es el incentivo al ahorro.
Alicia es casada y tiene 2 hijos que están estudiando, tiene un puesto en el mercado Magdalena en donde vende abarrotes en general, actividad que realiza todos los días desde muy temprano. Además Alicia tiene un pequeño taller de confección de prendas de vestir en su casa, actividad que realiza en sus tiempos libres. Alicia solicita un préstamo de 1000 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de arroz y azúcar.
Alicia sueña con construir otra casa en un terreno que ya adquirió y que sus hijos culminen sus estudios.
texts.en:
Alicia is a member of the Buena Suerte (Good Luck) communal bank; what she most likes about it is the savings incentives. Alicia is married and has two children who are students. She has a stall in the Magdalena market where she sells groceries every day starting very early in the morning. In addition, Magdalena also has a small seamstress workshop in her home where she makes clothes in her spare time. Alicia is asking for a 1000 sol loan to buy rice and sugar. Her dreams are to build another house on a lot she already acquired and that her children complete their schooling.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy rice and sugar.

loans.name: Aydee

texts.es:
Aydee es socia del Banco Comunal Buena Suerte y lo que mas le agrada es el incentivo al ahorro y los prestamos son de mucha ayuda para su negocio.
Aydee es conviviente, tiene 2 hijos de 15 y 12 años que están estudiando, Aydee vende ropa variada de acuerdo a pedidos de sus clientes, sus ventas los realiza en la selva ayacuchana, sus productos los adquiere en la ciudad de Lima. Además Ayde junto a su esposo tienen carros que realizan transporte de pasajeros, uno de ellos es conducido por su esposo y el otro por un chofer. Su préstamo será invertido en la compra de pantalones, polos.
Sus sueños son equipar su casa y que su hijo viaje de promoción de estudios.
texts.en:
Aydee is a member of the Buena Suerte (Good Luck) communal bank; what she likes best about it are the savings incentives and the loans that are of great help to her business. Aydee lives with her life partner; has two children, who are 15 and 12 years old, who are students. Aydee sells assorted clothing on order to customers in the Ayacucho backcountry; she gets her merchandise in Lima. In addition, together with her husband, Aidee has vehicles with which they provide public transportation services; one of them is driven by her husband and the other one by a driver. She will use the funds to buy pants and polo-type shirts. Her dreams are to furnish her house and that her son goes on his class graduation trip.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy pants and polo-type shirts.

loans.name: Simon

texts.es: Simon, de 54 años, es un padre de familia muy alegre y trabajador, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposa Andrea de 36 años y a sus 3 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindarles una mejor calidad de vida. Hace más de 25 años que se dedica al cultivo de plátanos y café, que junto a su esposa salen desde muy temprano para trabajar en la tierra, con el fin de que sea productiva y puedan ser vendidas rápidamente. Disfruta mucho de la actividad que realiza, que es cultivar, sin embargo lo más difícil es tener que estar pendiente de sus plantas para que la plaga de insectos no ataquen y perjudiquen su producción. Con el tiempo, desea comprar más tierras, para incrementar su producción de café que actualmente produce. Este es su segundo crédito con MFP y se siente en la capacidad de pagar todas sus cuotas, es uno de los miembros más activos en su grupo comunal, por eso es muy querido y respetado. Con los seiscientos nuevos soles que solicita, comprará fertilizantes para que sean productivas sus tierras.
texts.en:
Simon is 54 years old; he is a father and is a happy and hardworking man. He lives in his own home with his wife Andrea (36 years old) and his three lovely children whom he wishes to give a better quality of life. For more than 25 years he has been growing bananas and coffee and with his wife they go very early to work on the land so that it can be productive and the crops can be sold quickly. He enjoys his work very much despite having to take care of his plants constantly so that insects don’t attack and hurt his crops. In the future he hopes to buy more land to increase his coffee production. This is Simon's second loan with MFP (Kiva’s field partner) and he feels able to pay all of his quotas; he is one of the most active members of his communal bank and that is why he is very well-liked and respected. With the 600 nuevos soles he will buy fertilizers so that his land will be more productive.

Translated from Spanish by Mayra Duque, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy fertilizers to improve his production of coffee.

loans.name: Vilda

texts.es:
La Sra. Vilda B. tiene 50 años de edad, esta en pareja hace varios años, tiene 9 hijos, de los cuales solo dos son menores y en edad escolar, los demas trabajan y estudian en la universidad y otros algunas carreras técnicas.
La Sra. Vilda se dedica junto con su esposo y uno de sus hijos a la compra y venta de frutas y verduras desde hace 10 años aproximadamente, sus mercaderias los compra en forma diaria del mercado municipal de abasto en Asunción, luego se dividen las merdaderias en 3 partes para dirigirse a diferentes itinerarios durante el dia. 
Se inicio con unos pocos ahorros en forma ambulante y luego compro dos carros para aumentar su zona de trabajo, actualmente cuenta con ambos carros y accederieron a la compra de una camioneta.
La señora invirtio el crédito en la ampliación de frutas y verduras ya que con la compra de su camioneta pueden aumentar la cantidad de frutas a transportar
texts.en:
Vilda B., 50, has been in a relationship for several years; she has 9 children, two of whom are still school-aged minors, the rest work and go to the university, some have technical careers. Vilda, her husband and one of her sons have sold fruits and vegetables for about 10 years now. They buy their merchandise daily at Asunción’s wholesale foodstuffs market then split it into three parts to be distributed along different routes during the day. She started out as an itinerant merchant with just a few stock items but afterwards was able to buy two cars in order to expand their sales area; currently she still has the two cars and has upgraded to the purchase of a van too. She used the loan to buy larger amounts of fruits and vegetables because now that they have the van they are able to transport larger amounts.

Translated from Spanish by Michael Bujazan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es: Victoria, de 28 años es una madre de familia muy responsable y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Samuel de 29 años y su único hijo Yonatan de 10 años. Todos los días, muy temprano por la mañana, Victoria sale a trabajar sus campos, para ella no existen los días de descanso, ya que tiene que trabajar continuamente su chacra, para tener una buena producción. Sus principales productos son el plátano y el café, los cuales vende al por mayor en la ciudad de “La Merced”. Lleva 4 años realizando esta actividad y lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es la libertad que tiene trabajando en sus cultivos y considera que lo más difícil es cuidar sus cultivos de las plagas que pueden aquejarlas. Para el futuro desea comprar más tierras para sembrar más café. Este es su sexto crédito con MFP, ha sido muy puntual en el pago de sus cuotas y espera serlo ahora también. En su grupo comunal es una persona muy querida por el resto de sus compañeras, ya que es muy alegre. Con los mil seiscientos nuevos soles que solicita, comprará más abono para hacer más productivas sus tierras.
texts.en:
Victoria, age 28, is a very responsible and hard-working mother. She lives in her own house with her 29 year old husband, Samuel, and her only child, 10 year old Yonatan. Victoria leaves to work in the fields very early in the morning everyday. There are no days off for her. She has to continually work her farm in order to have good production. Her main products are bananas and coffee. She sells them wholesale in the city of La Merced. She has been doing this activity for four years. What she likes the best about her work is the freedom she has working her crops. The most difficult part is taking care of her crops so that the pests are not able to damage them. In the future she wants to buy more land to plant more coffee. This is her sixth loan with MFP. She has been very punctual making her payments, and she expects to do the same now as well. She is a well-liked by her colleagues in her communal bank because she is very happy. She will use the 1,600 PEN she is requesting to buy more fertilizer to make her fields more productive.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy more fertilizer to improve her coffee and banana production

loans.name: Margret

texts.en:
Margret is a young lady of 30 years of age, married to a driver, with two children whom she looks after together with her husband in a family of nine people. Their dream is to educate their children so as to have better future. She operates a retail shop in Fort Portal and has been in the business for the past six years. 

Having first been employed as a receptionist, she set up a retail shop in which she saw better opportunities than the job. She however says she faces a challenge with the ever-increasing rates of rent. She says she would like to have a lot of items in her shop so as to meet demand for the customers in her shop. This is her second loan and she intends to purchase boxes of milk, soap, and cleaning materials for resale.

loans.use: purchasing boxes of milk, soap, and cleaning materials  for resale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase plates and irons

loans.name: Clementina Del Socorro

texts.es:
La señora clementina V. es casada y con 2 hijos los cuales están en escuela secundaria, su esposo tiene el oficio de albañil y carpintero y trabajo por cuenta propia, viven en la comarca los zanjones Nº 2 Posoltega y es en la misma comarca donde Clementina trabaja, ya que ella es maestra de educación primaria y labora para la Escuela Julia Martinez Toruño desde hace 23 años.
La profesora Clementina esta siendo beneficiada por un organismo el cual les va facilitar 1,500 palitos de eucalipto por manzana para reforestación y es para dicho proyecto que ella solicito su tercer crédito en Ceprodel, ya que con una parte del dinero lo invertirá en la compra de insecticidas y pago de la limpia del terreno y el resto para otros gastos en su casa de habitación.
Con Ceprodel trabaja desde el año 2007 y hasta el momento tiene un buen record crediticio, ya que ha sabido ser responsable con su obligación.
texts.en:
Señora Clementina V. is married and has 2 children who are in secondary school. Her husband is a builder and carpenter and works for himself. They live in the region Los Zanjones Nº 2 Posoltega and in the same zone where Clementina works. She is a primary school teacher and has worked for the Julia Martinez Toruño school for 23 years. Profesora Clementina is being favoured by an organisation which is going to provide her with a block of 1,500 eucalyptus seedlings for reforestation. It's for this said project that she is seeking her third loan with Ceprodel. She will invest part of the money in the purchase of insecticides and to pay for the land to be cleared, and the rest will go towards household costs. Clemetina has been working with Ceprodel since 2007 and has a good credit record with them, as she knows about being responsible with her obligations.

Translated from Spanish by Jane McCrory, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Reforestation of 2 Mz of eucalyptus (purchase insecticides, pay for clearing of 2mz of land)

loans.name: Catalina

texts.es: Catalina, de 42 años, es una mujer muy sencilla y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Victoriano de 52 años y sus 5 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindarles una mejor calidad de vida. Desde muy pequeña Catalina aprendió a trabajar en la chacra junto a sus padres, quienes le enseñaron todo lo que se tiene que hacer, para lograr un buen cultivo, ahora tiene sus propias tierras, las cuales cultiva y cuida con mucho amor y paciencia. Ella siembra alverja, papa, olluco y cebada, las cuales lleva a vender al mercado mayorista de Tarma. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cosechar sus cultivos, ya que recibe la recompensa de todo el esfuerzo que dio en su trabajo. Lleva 20 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es cuidar sus cultivos de las plagas que pueden afectarlos. Su deseo es comprar nuevas tierras, con las cuales pueda ampliar y aumentar su producción. Este es su sexto crédito con MFP, sabe que tiene que pagar sus cuotas puntualmente y esta dispuesta a hacerlo. En su grupo comunal es una compañera muy alegre y siempre está de buen humor en las reuniones. Con los dos mil nuevos soles que solicita, comprará abono para sus tierras, ya que desea que sus nuevas siembras le den buenos frutos.
texts.en:
Catalina is a simple and hardworking 42 year old woman, who lives in her own home with her 52 year old husband, Victorino and their 5 children. She loves her children very much and hopes to give them a better quality of life. From a young age Catalina learned to work on the farm alongside her parents, who showed her everything that needed to be done to have a successful harvest.
